review: Great game, reminds me of spore...Alot of fun but after about 5-10 minutes of playing it crashes...This usually happens when a new enemy hcomes in with some really awesome vehicle parts that I want. But as soon as i get close, I get the spinning beach ball of death. Other than that, great game, I recommend you try out the demo.

Very addicting game with great RPG elements. the free version will keep you entertained hours, but if you want the best experience get the bought version. You will receive additional items plus unlimited backpack space so you dont have to throw out all the stuff you find. This game is worth it.
